column1: asyai v[_]i yajñaḥ[_]tāyate a[_]yai kriyate asyai saṃbhriyate
sra[_]ve drapsasya dhamataḥ sa[_] asvaran iti
na ha asmin alpam ca[_]na e[_]aḥ pariśiṣyate
sa dun[_]ubhe sajūs[_]indreṇa devaiḥ dūrāt davīya[_] apa sedha śatrūn
sam hi [_]o[_]ena agata sam u sarveṇa padvatā
saḥ akāmayata dāna kāmāḥ me pr[_]jāḥ syuḥ i[_]i
jani[_]raiḥ eva enam t[_]t samanumatam ālabhante
havir[_]hānābhyā[_] prohyamāṇā[_]hyām anubrūhi iti āha adhvaryuḥ
kena parjanyam a[_]u eti kena somam [_]icakṣaṇam
sarvāṇi vāva chandāṃsi ca pṛṣṭhā[_]i ca somam r[_]jān[_]m krītam anu āyanti
hariścandra[_] ha vaidhasa[_] aikṣvākaḥ rājā a [_]utraḥ āsa
svarbhānuḥ vai āsuraḥ sūryam t[_]masā vid[_]yat
sarvābhyaḥ eva en[_]m tat devatābhyaḥ anant[_]rāyam nirvapa[_]ti
draviṇaḥ dāḥ [_]adātu naḥ vasūni yān[_] śṛṇvire
śri[_]am eva yaśaḥ ātman dhatte yaḥ [_]vam v[_]dvān bṛhatyau kurute
yat vāru[_]aḥ varuṇena [_]va enam grāhayitvā stṛṇute
tat asmai etat praj[_]m eva parokṣam āśā[_]te
m[_] iṣuḥ paptat indra[_]ya ahani āgate
tṛṣṭike t[_]ṣṭa vandane ud amūm chi[_]ddhi tṛṣṭike yathā kṛta dviṣṭā asaḥ amuṣmai [_]epyāv[_]te
avīra[_]hā pra cara so[_]a duryān iti
bhadrāt abhi śre[_]aḥ prehi iti anv[_]ha
tāḥ asmai kāmam [_]amardhay[_]nti yad kāmaḥ bhavati
sa vai cat[_]ḥ upahva[_]amānaḥ atha nānā iva upahvayate ajāmitāy[_]i
agne [_]am yajñam adhvaram viśvatas paribh[_]ḥ asi saḥ id [_]eveṣu gacchati
somena[_]pūrṇa[_] kalaśam bibharṣi t[_]aṣṭā rūpāṇām janitā paśūnām
piśāc[_]n sarvān oṣadhe pra mṛṇīhi sahasv[_] ca
ūrdhvaḥ binduḥ ud acarat bra[_]ma[_]aḥ kakudāt adhi
bhūmeḥ c[_] vai sa[_] agneḥ ca oṣadhī[_]ām ca va[_]aspatīnām ca vānaspatyānām ca vīrudhām [_]a priy[_]m dhāma bhavati yaḥ evam veda
sa yat prācīm diśam anuvyacalat mā[_][_]ta[_] śardhaḥ[_]bhūtvā anuvyacalat manaḥ anna ādam kṛtvā
sarva[_]ḥ [_]ai chandobhiḥ iṣṭvā devāḥ sv[_]rgam lokam ajayan
pareṇa datv[_]tī rajj[_]ḥ pareṇa aghāyuḥ arṣatu
yakṣ[_]āṇām sarveṣām [_]iṣam niḥ avocam aham tvat
medasaḥ ca hi eva[_]hi ghṛtasya [_]a bhavanti
ghnantaḥ vai etābhiḥ devāḥ [_]uraḥ bhindantaḥ ā[_]an y[_]t upasadaḥ
dviṣ[_]ntam ev[_] asmai tat pāpmānam bh[_]ātṛvyam apabādhate adhara[_] pādayati
asma[_] kāmāya upa k[_]minīḥ viśve vaḥ devāḥ [_]pasaṃyantu
yat enam āha vrātya ya[_][_]ā te nikāmaḥ [_]athā[_]astu iti nikāmam eva tena avarunddhe
asmākebhiḥ satvabhiḥ śūra śū[_]aiḥ vīryā [_]ṛ[_]hi yāni te kartvāni
abhi t[_]ā deva savitar iti sāvitrīm anv[_]ha

tasyāḥ grīṣmaḥ ca vasantaḥ ca dvau p[_]dau āstām śarad ca v[_]rṣāḥ ca dvau[_]bṛhat[_]ca rathantaram[_]ca anūcye āstām yajñāyajñiyam c[_] vāma[_]evyam ca ti[_]aścye ṛcaḥ[_]prāñcaḥ tantavaḥ yajūṃṣi tiryañcaḥ vedaḥ āst[_]raṇam brahma upabarhaṇ[_]m sāma [_]sādaḥ ud[_]īthaḥ apaśrayaḥ
yaḥ idam strī pu[_]ān akaḥ iha [_]a stuvatām janaḥ
tāsām tri[_] pratham[_]m anvāha tris uttamām
uta pūrvasya nighnat[_]ḥ ni h[_]nti aparaḥ prati
tat yasya eva[_] vidvān vrātyaḥ caturthīm r[_]trim atithiḥ gṛhe vasati ye pu[_]yānām[_]puṇy[_]ḥ lokāḥ tān eva tena [_]varunddhe
g[_]ya sphānaḥ pr[_]tara[_]aḥ su vīraḥ iti gavām naḥ sphāvayitā pratārayitā edhi it[_] eva tat āha
prati yat āpaḥ adṛśram āyatīḥ ghṛtam payāṃsi b[_]bhratī[_] madh[_]ni adhvaryubhiḥ manasā saṃvidānāḥ indrā[_]a somam su sutam bharan[_]īḥ [_] im[_]ḥ agman revat[_]ḥ jīva dhanyāḥ
yāvat eva brahma tena enam sarveṇa a[_]hicarat[_]
ugraḥ enam devaḥ i[_]vāsa[_] udīcyāḥ diśaḥ ant[_]rdeśāt anuṣṭhātā anu[_]iṣṭhati
cara eva iti vai m[_] brāhmaṇaḥ avocat[_]iti
manasā anna [_]dena annam atti yaḥ evam[_]veda
tṛcam āg[_]eyam gā[_]atram anvāha agnau mathyamāne
abhi eva enān tat vaṣaṭkar[_]ti yathā[_]soma[_]ya agne vīhi iti
t[_]smāt tasya aśitavya[_] ca eva līpsitavyam ca
tat āhuḥ yat eṣa[_]hav[_]ḥ eva yat paś[_]ḥ atha asya bahu apaiti lomāni tvac a[_]ṛk kuṣṭhikāḥ śaphāḥ viṣ[_]ṇe skandati[_]piśitam kena asya t[_]t āpūryate iti
yat vāyav[_] vāyuḥ eva asmai prāṇam ninayat[_]
a p[_]ayāja[_][_]ananuyājam bhavati iṣvai saṃśityai a pratiśarāya
pari tvā parita[_][_]unā ikṣuṇā agām a vidviṣe yathā mām kāminī asaḥ[_]yathā mat n[_] apagā asaḥ
yaḥ tejaskāmaḥ syāt saḥ[_]etān a[_][_]drān ṛṣabhān ālabheta
atho khalu[_]yadā eva adhvaryuḥ upākuryāt at[_]a[_]anubrūyāt
sukhaḥ rathaḥ iva vartat[_][_] kṛtyā kṛtyā kṛtam punar
at[_]a u āhuḥ vasā vai sā āsīt tat vasā vai etā[_] iti
paśuḥ vai [_]īyamānaḥ sa mṛtyum prāpaśyat sa devān[_]na anvakām[_]yata etum
ā tvā vahantu har[_]yaḥ vṛṣaṇam s[_]ma pītaye [_]ndra tvā sūra cakṣasaḥ
[_]ndram prātar havāmahe indram prayat[_] adh[_]are indram somasya pītaye
yat indram aiḥ āt t[_]ā ṛṣabhaḥ ahvayat tas[_]āt te vṛtrahā [_]ayaḥ kṣīram kruddhaḥ[_]aharat vaśe
aśvasya aśvatar[_]sya ajasya petvasya ca [_]tha ṛṣabha[_]y[_] ye vājāḥ tān asmin dhehi tanū vaśin
tvam naḥ asi[_]bh[_]rata agne vaśābhiḥ ukṣabhiḥ aṣṭāpadībh[_]ḥ āhutaḥ
ekaḥ viśvasya bh[_]vanasya rājā sa yo[_]hay[_] ca kṣayayā ca janān
agnim eva[_]tat sarvatas goptāram[_]paridatte ātmane ca yaja[_]ānāya ca yatra ev[_]m v[_]dvān etayā paridadhāti
sa yat devān[_][_]nuvyacalat īśānaḥ bhūtvā anuvyacalat manyum ann[_] ādam kṛt[_]ā
yat v[_]ruṇaḥ varuṇāt eva enam tena muñc[_]ti
deva yā[_] vipra[_] ud iyarti vācam iti
sapta c[_] vai śatāni viṃśatiḥ ca [_]aṃvatsara[_]ya ahorātrāḥ
pra[_]itiṣṭhati yaḥ evam vidvān an[_]ṣṭubhau kurute
tathā hi yajñaḥ sarva pād duhe dātre an apasp[_]u[_]an
brāhma[_]āt indra rādhasaḥ pib[_] somam ṛtūṃr anu
ye vaḥ devāḥ pitaraḥ ye ca putrāḥ sacetasaḥ me[_]śṛṇutā idam[_]ukta[_]
[_]hūyasībhiḥ ha asya [_]hutibhiḥ iṣṭam[_]bhavati kevalena ha asya paśunā[_]iṣṭam bhavat[_] yaḥ evam veda
yat saumāpauṣṇaḥ svay[_] eva asm[_]i[_]devatayā indriyam vīryam āptvā[_]avarunddhe
te vai samāv[_]t ev[_] yajñe kurvāṇāḥ āyan
tat [_]huḥ na[_]pūrva dīkṣiṇaḥ saṃsavaḥ asti parigṛhītaḥ[_]vai etasya[_]yajñaḥ parigṛhītāḥ devatāḥ[_]na etasya ā[_]tiḥ asti apara dīkṣiṇaḥ eva yathā ta[_]hā iti
upa u as[_]āṁ iḍā hvayatām iti
tayā ātman śṛtayā hot[_] yajamānāya āś[_]ṣam āśāste
etāni h[_] yajñe pra[_]amām iva kriyante
ājarasam ha [_]smai vāji[_]am na [_]pacchidyate yaḥ evam veda
yā āyaiḥ parinṛtyati ādad[_]nā kṛtam glahāt sā naḥ kṛtāni s[_]ṣatī prahā[_] āpnotu māy[_]yā
ye āg[_]re mṛgayante pratikrośe amāv[_]sye kravyādaḥ anyān dipsa[_]aḥ sarvān tān[_]sahasā sahe
y[_]t e[_]am āha vrātya yathā te priyam tathā astu iti priyam eva [_]ena avarundd[_]e
yaḥ pāpmanā tamasā gṛhītaḥ manyeta sa[_] etam ai[_]dram [_]ṣabham ālabheta
yaḥ traitā[_]ām ut[_]amaḥ jāyeta tam saumāpau[_]ṇam ālabheta paśu kāmaḥ
yat[_]lalāmāḥ [_]lab[_]yanta mukhataḥ asmin taiḥ tejaḥ adadhāt yat śiti [_]akud[_]ḥ upariṣṭāt taiḥ yat śveta anūkāśāḥ paś[_]āt taiḥ
[_]uṣyati p[_]ajām ca paśūn ca yaḥ evam vidvān[_]bailvam yūpam kurute
paś[_]nām eva asmai rū[_]āṇi āptvā avarunddhe
tatas vai devāḥ yūpa[_] vajram apaśya[_]
yadi ha v[_]i api a brāhmaṇa [_]ktaḥ yad[_] durukta uktaḥ[_]yajate atha ha eṣā āhutiḥ gacchatī eva devān na[_]pāpmanā saṃsṛj[_]ate
vṛkṣam vṛkṣam ā rohasi vṛṣaṇ[_][_]ntī iva kanyalā
ime somāsaḥ in[_]avaḥ sut[_]saḥ adhi barhiṣi
teṣām vapāyām eva[_]hutāyām svarga[_] lokaḥ prākhyā[_]ata

sūryasya raśmīn anu yāḥ saṃcaranti marīcīḥ vā yāḥ anusaṃcara[_]ti yāsām ṛ[_]abhaḥ dūratas vāj[_]nīvān [_]adyas sarvān lokān paryeti rakṣan sa naḥ[_]aitu homam im[_]m juṣāṇaḥ antarikṣeṇa s[_]ha v[_]j[_]nīvān
[_]as[_]ai ūrdhv[_]yāḥ [_]iśaḥ antardeśāt mahādevam iṣvāsam anuṣṭhātāram akurvan
ten[_] jyotiṣā yajamānaḥ puras jyotiḥ svargam lo[_]am e[_]i
uta g[_]āḥ vyantu deva patnīḥ indrāṇī agn[_]y[_] aśvinī rāj
a[_]am naḥ viśva bheṣajaḥ jaṅ[_]iḍaḥ pātu aṃhasaḥ
etat vai ahnaḥ rūp[_]m yat śukla[_] yat[_]kṛṣṇam tat rātreḥ
vaṣaṭkā[_]e[_]a anna ādena annam atti yaḥ evam veda
saḥ aś[_]inau tuṣṭāva atas uttareṇa t[_]cena
yajñasya e[_]a tat barsau nahya[_]i [_]themne balāya a visraṃsāya
tat yat muṣṭī kurute yajñam c[_] eva tat s[_]r[_]āḥ ca[_]devatāḥ muṣṭyoḥ kurute
pāka yajñiyayā iva vai etat iḍay[_] a[_]āriṣuḥ
yatra vai adaḥ indraḥ[_]vṛṣaṇaśvasya menā āsīt [_]at enam nirṛtiḥ pāpm[_][_]agṛhṇāt
paśuḥ vai medh[_]ḥ yajamān[_]ḥ medha patiḥ
yaḥ anyedyus ubhayadyus abhyeti tṛtīyak[_]ya [_]amaḥ astu [_]akmane
stutaḥ ca vām mādhvī suṣṭutiḥ ca rasāḥ ca ye vām anu rātim a[_][_][_]n
ayam iha prathamaḥ dhāyi [_]hātṛbhiḥ iti jagatīm vaiśyasya anu[_]r[_]yāt
prasūtaḥ indra pravat[_] haribh[_]ām pra te va[_]raḥ pramṛṇan etu śatrūn
yat vāyave vāyuḥ [_]va enam bh[_]tyai ninayati
tat yat stokāḥ ścotanti sarva devaty[_]ḥ vai stokā[_] tasmāt iyam[_]stokaśas vṛṣṭiḥ vibhaktā [_]pāc[_]rati
yat vaḥ vaya[_] pra mināma vratāni viduṣām devau aviduṣṭ[_]rāsaḥ agniḥ ṭat viśvam ā pṛṇāti vi[_]v[_][_] yebhiḥ de[_]āṁ ṛtubhiḥ kalpayāti
virāḍbh[_]ām vai iṣṭvā devāḥ svargam lokam[_]ajayan
s[_]prajāḥ san saḥ udāre na sarṣat yaḥ na aśnīyāt anaḍuhaḥ[_][_]ijānan
yat savitāram[_]yajati tasmā[_] uttaratas paścāt ayam bhūyiṣṭham pav[_]mānaḥ pavat[_]
mā naḥ arātiḥ ī[_]ata devasya mar[_]yasya ca
nava k[_]pālaḥ bhavati prāṇānām kﾱptyai pr[_]ṇ[_]nām pratiprajñātyai
ekadhā asya tvacam pur[_] nābhyāḥ apiś[_]saḥ vapām utkhi[_]atāt
yāḥ eva etāḥ anvāha etāḥ pur[_]nuvākyāḥ yaḥ praiṣaḥ sa p[_]ai[_]aḥ yā [_]ājyā sā yājyā
sa tathā iti ukt[_]ā putram āmantrayāmāsa tata[_]ayam vai mahyam tvām adadā[_] ha[_]ta tva[_]ā aham imam yajai iti
apannad[_]tī bhavati sarva tvā[_]a an adhisk[_]nnā samṛddhyai
devaiḥ dattena maṇinā jaṅgiḍena mayobhuvā[_]viṣkandham sar[_]ā [_]ak[_]āṃsi vyāyāme sahāmahe
viṣā viṣātakī asi pa[_]ivṛktā yathā asasi[_]ṛṣabhasya vaśā [_]va
tat āhuḥ na ya[_]ñe rakṣasā[_][_]kīrtayet kāni rakṣāṃsi ṛterakṣāḥ vai yajñaḥ [_]ti
gāya[_]ryau sviṣṭakṛtaḥ saṃyājy[_] kurvīta tej[_]skāmaḥ brahmavarcasa kāmaḥ
sa ha uvāca śu[_]aḥśepaḥ[_]saṃjānāneṣu vai brūyāḥ sauhardyāya[_]me śriyai yath[_] aham bhar[_]ta ṛṣabha upeyām tava putra[_]tām iti
prajā[_]ati āyat[_]nābhiḥ eva ābhiḥ rādhnoti yaḥ evam ved[_]
ye[_]a vehat babhūv[_]tha nāśayāmasi tat tvat
vai[_]vānar[_]ḥ raśmibhiḥ naḥ punātu[_]vātaḥ prāṇena iṣiraḥ nabhobhiḥ
etat ha vai manu[_][_]bibhay[_]ṃcakāra idam vai me taniṣṭham yaj[_]asya yat iyam iḍā pāk[_] ya[_]ñiyā yat vai me ih[_] rakṣāṃsi yajñam na hiṃsyuḥ iti
asmai tis[_]aḥ avyathyāya [_]ārīḥ devāya devīḥ didhiṣanti an[_]am
bhadrāt plak[_]āt niḥ tiṣṭhasi [_]śvatt[_]āt khadirāt dhavāt bhadrāt[_]nyagrodhāt parṇāt
vācam [_]va tat āruhya tayā svargam lokam abhi sa[_]tar[_]ti
upa a[_]vinoḥ priyam dhāma [_]acchati jayati paramam lo[_]am yaḥ evam veda
agama[_] yā purā gandharveṣ[_] avāksam iti eva tat vāc prabr[_]te
upa priyam[_]panipnatam y[_][_]ānam āhutī vṛdham aganma bibhrataḥ namaḥ
ambayaḥ yanti adhvabhiḥ jāmaya[_] adhvarīyatām pṛñc[_]tīḥ madhu[_]ā payaḥ
yaḥ a[_]ya ṣaṣṭhaḥ vyānaḥ te ārtav[_]ḥ
adhvar[_]avaḥ payasā[_]udhar yathā goḥ somebhiḥ īm pṛṇat[_] bhojam indram
dyubhiḥ [_]ktubhiḥ pari pātam [_]smān ariṣṭebhiḥ aśvinā saubhage[_]hiḥ
atha [_]aḥ aparasyām ekāṣṭakā[_]ām jāyeta [_]am evam eva utsṛjya atha indrāya vṛtrature ālabhet[_]
tebhyaḥ ha yaḥ a niv[_]dya svargam lokam e[_]i īśvarāḥ ha enam ni vā[_]roddhoḥ vi[_]vā mathitoḥ
ā yātu m[_]traḥ ṛtubhiḥ kalpamānaḥ saṃveśayan pṛthiv[_]m usriyābhi[_]
agniḥ vai devānām avamaḥ v[_]ṣṇ[_]ḥ paramaḥ
vṛtratūr iti hi etam ā[_]uḥ yaḥ svār[_]jyam gacchati
yadi naḥ gām haṃsi yad[_] aśvam[_]yadi pūruṣam tam tvā sīsen[_] vidhyāmaḥ yathā naḥ asa[_][_]a vīra hā
atha enam u[_][_]ca [_]aruṇam rājānam upadhāva putraḥ me jāyatām[_]tena tvā yajai iti
tīkṣṇa iṣavaḥ abala dhanvanaḥ hata[_]ugra āyudhā[_] abalān [_]gra bāhavaḥ
tam ha uvāca[_]ajani vai te[_]putraḥ yajasva mā anena[_]iti
tat āhuḥ sa v[_]i hotā syāt yaḥ etasyām ṛci sarvāṇi[_]chan[_]āṃsi pra[_]anayet iti
yoniḥ[_]vai eṣā dīkṣi[_]asya yat dīkṣita vimitam
itas jāta[_] viśvam idam vi ca[_]ṭe
eṣa vai brāhmaṇānām sab[_]āsāhaḥ sakhā yat som[_]ḥ r[_]jā
brahma eva asma[_] etat etat purogavam[_]akaḥ
somam vai rāj[_]nam praṇīyamānam a[_]tareṇa e[_]a sadaḥ havirdhānāni as[_]rāḥ rakṣāṃsi ajighāṃsan
agniḥ m[_]kham prathamaḥ devatānām agni[_] ca viṣṇo tapaḥ uttamam mahaḥ[_]iti āgn[_]vaiṣṇav[_]sya haviṣaḥ yājyā[_]anuvākye bhavataḥ
tasya krītasya manuṣy[_]n abhi upāvart[_]mānasya di[_]aḥ vīryāṇi indriyāṇi vyudasīda[_]
yajñasya eva tat barsau nahyati sthemne [_]al[_]ya a visr[_]ṃsāya

tasya pratīcyām diśi[_]irā puṃś[_]alī hasaḥ māgadhaḥ vijñāna[_] vāsaḥ ah[_]r uṣ[_]īṣam rātrī keśāḥ haritau p[_]avartau kalmali[_] maṇiḥ ahar ca rātrī ca par[_]ṣkandau manaḥ vipatham mātariśvā ca[_]p[_]vamānaḥ ca[_]vipatha vāhau vātaḥ sārathiḥ reṣmā[_]pratodaḥ kīrtiḥ ca y[_]śaḥ ca puraḥsarau
